Message - Class in ru.bit.torrent
Message class represents a Peer-to-Peer message in the protocol (Unchoke, Interested, Piece, etc.).
Message(byte) - Constructor for class ru.bit.torrent.Message
 
MessageHandler - Class in ru.bit.torrent
This class is used to facilitate communication between a "Manager" and each one of its' peers; that is, for every Peer that Manager wants to connect to, a new MessageHandler is created.
MessageHandler(Manager, Peer, TorrentInfo) - Constructor for class ru.bit.torrent.MessageHandler
 
messageHandler - Variable in class ru.bit.torrent.Peer
A MessageHandler Thread attached to the Peer
messageQueue - Variable in class ru.bit.torrent.Peer
An ArrayList of Messages that represents of a queue of messages that need to be sent out to this peer.
messageSender - Variable in class ru.bit.torrent.MessageHandler
Message sender responsible for sending messages to peer.
MessageSender - Class in ru.bit.torrent
MessageSender is a thread instantiated in every MessageHandler who's duty is to send out all the messages in a given peer's queue.
MessageSender(Peer, DataOutputStream) - Constructor for class ru.bit.torrent.MessageSender
 
mH - Variable in class ru.bit.torrent.Peer
a MessageHandler Object which is needed to pass along information from PerformanceAnalyzer
myPieces - Variable in class ru.bit.torrent.Manager
A boolean array used to store all the pieces we download.
MyPiecesPanel - Class in ru.gui

myPiecesPanel - Variable in class ru.gui.PeerDisplay
